title: Session Result
description: Result of a pytest session, including collect reports and test reports.

session_id.description: The unique if of this test session.

start_timestamp.description: The start time of the pytest session in ISO 8601 format.

stop_timestamp.description: The stop time of the pytest session in ISO 8601 format.

python.description: The Python distribution that ran the tests.

pytest_version.description: The version of pytest that generated the report.

plugin_version.description: The version of the plugin that generated the report.

exit_status.description: The exit status of the pytest run. 0 indicates success, non-zero indicates failure.

collect_reports.description: Collect reports generated during the session.

test_reports.description: Test reports generated during the session.

project.description: The project that is being tested.
